Articles.Content:
Hello, friends. I know what you might be thinking: “Hey, this guy sounds familiar.”

Well good news: you’re not getting random deja vu. I’m here for 2 reasons: 1, to say hi to all the new members that have joined in my absence; and 2, to say just a couple words. 
Before we get there, however, I’d like to introduce myself. My name’s DarkOwl57. Most say “Dark,” a few use “DarkOwl”, even less say “Owl” and to this day I’ve never had anyone use my full name (number and all) when referring to me. I’m a writer- or at least was- on this forum. About a year ago, I decided to unofficially call it quits from the forum, and stop my writing. To everyone that remembers me, it’s great to see you again. To those that don’t, it’s good to meet you. But to everyone, I have just two words.

I’m back.

8 hours ago, DarkOwl57 said:

I’m back

Huzzah! Fly Safe.

On 3/8/2021 at 1:34 PM, DarkOwl57 said:

But to everyone, I have just two words.

I’m back.

the return of one of the many kings

Ah yes, the return of the king...

 

Spoiler

Now all I can think of is the third book of lord of the rings.
